delete.summary: Remove a principal to Entity's role permissions
delete.description: Remove a  principal to Entity's role permissions

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity that is fetched

parameters.name: principalId
parameters.description: ID of principal to remove from the Entity's role

400.description: Invalid ID, roleName or principalId supplied

404.description: Invalid ID, roleName or principalId not found
